ruling: - If there are Spell or Trap Cards, or face-down monsters, on your opponent's side of the field, [[Drillago]] cannot attack directly.

- If [[Drillago]] attacks directly, and your opponent activates an effect to reduce one of their face-up monsters to less than 1600 ATK, there is no longer a condition allowing [[Drillago]] to attack directly, and a replay occurs.

- If [[Drillago]] attacks directly, and your opponent activates [[Ready for Intercepting]] from their hand, because their [[Makyura the Destructor]] was sent to the Graveyard earlier this turn, to flip one of their face-up monsters face-down, there is no longer a condition allowing [[Drillago]] to attack directly, and a replay occurs.
